website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Zoom Train Complete is a versatile workout shoe that received a mixed reaction from consumers. They enjoyed the comfort, support, and cushioning which it delivered during various kinds of grueling training regimens. It was also lauded for its chic design and snug fit. However, the ratings of this product were affected by its reported lack of durability and a painfully tight fit. But on the whole, the shoe proved to be comfortable and well-rounded for most users.
pros: A majority of buyers remarked that the Nike Zoom Train Complete felt comfortable
Some gym rats liked that the ultra-responsive heel delivered cushioning and support for workouts of different intensities
The shoe was suitable for various workouts, including running, agility drills, and weightlifting, according to many training enthusiasts
Many reviewers said that it had a snug true-to-size fitting
Several fashion-conscious users praised this training shoe for its stylish design
cons: According to numerous fitness enthusiasts, the Nike Zoom Train Complete had several durability issues with its tread peeling off and the Zoom Air unit deflating after a few uses
Some consumers found the shoe’s fit too tight, especially in the forefoot area

customer_reviews.title: but very comfortable. Lots of Nike sneakers are on the small ...
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit, but very comfortable. Lots of Nike sneakers are on the small side now, and the tongue is completely integrated into the sneaker. IE, laces are totally superfluous; you will definitely stay stable in this shoe. Use it for running outside, at the gym, and 5k's.
customer_reviews.author: DRR13

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes but go up at least 1 size
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe but as with all Nike’s you better go at least a half size up I wear a 10 in all sizes but I ordered a 10.5 cause u know Nike runs small
customer_reviews.author: 13RWD

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second pair and yes they start out pretty snug on your feet, but once they are broke in they are extremely comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: BradleyCounty

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: As long as you know what size you are in a Nike, these shoes fit spot on. The shoe itself is very comfortable and supportive. I am an elementary school PE teacher so I wear them to school where I'm on my feet all day and so far they have been wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B Piechowicz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Does run a bit on the small side
customer_reviews.author: Jrock

customer_reviews.title: Nice workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, very light, very "grippy" bottom. I love it. Order half size larger, Nike runs small as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality.
customer_reviews.text: Neat colors, good fit. Tread was already coming off right out of the box. Rather than return, I glued tread back on because my son liked the fit & color.
customer_reviews.author: T. Moffitt

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy to use it. Perfect for gym
customer_reviews.author: Yuls

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised. Did a little light running then some walking, they did the job. Light weight and look good. If I had to complain, which you really can’t with these, i’d say they’re a little too flimsy. But that comes down to personal preference and what you are using the shoe for
customer_reviews.author: andy e.

customer_reviews.title: Nike rocks
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SHOES by Nike. Get these and you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: bill moore

customer_reviews.title: ... he chose it and he says his friends also liked how it looks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he chose it and he says his friends also liked how it looks. go for it men!! my husband got the pastel green one.
customer_reviews.author: brittnie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair of these before, this will be my second pair. I use them for "crossfit" type of exercise. they are very comfortable. The only downfall is they take some time to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Malvert

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, although more breathing would be appreciated. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: siggi

customer_reviews.title: Size 13
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and fits as expected. I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: david loff

customer_reviews.title: Over all expectation
customer_reviews.text: Over all quality of the shoe feels inferior to previously owned Zoom Training shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay B.

customer_reviews.title: Left leg somewhat small
customer_reviews.text: Left leg somewhat small, but with putting an object inside it got better. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Soares da Cunha
